title: Holidays & Events: National Foundation Day (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the National Foundation Day subcategory within Holidays & Events. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: In the lunisolar calendar, Japan's National Foundation Day falls on New Year's Day.
cards.romaji: Kenkoku kinen no hi wa, kyureki de wa Gantan desu.
cards.japanese: 建国記念の日は、旧暦では元旦です。
